name: Ahmed Ekram Alsada
summary: Junior DevOps Engineer with strong hands-on experience across the DevOps lifecycle, including CI/ CD pipelines, infrastructure as code, and cloud-native deployments. Proficient in AWS services, Docker, Kubernetes, and Helm, with practical experience using Terraform and Ansible for automation and provisioning. Skilled in building CI/ CD workflows with Jenkins, monitoring systems using Prometheus, Grafana, and CloudWatch, and managing Linux-based environments with a solid understanding of networking and security best practices.

experience.title: DevOps Intern
tasks: Completed 600+ hours of intensive, enterprise-style training covering technical, communication, and professional skills.
Administered Linux-based cloud environments, applying networking and security best practices.
Managed infrastructure as code solutions to provision, configure, and maintain scalable systems.
Built and optimized CI/CD workflows to automate build, test, and deployment processes.
Deployed and operated containerized applications in cloud-native environments, ensuring reliability and scalability.
Implemented monitoring and observability to track system performance, availability, and resource utilization.
Delivered multiple hands-on projects focused on automation, stability, and operational efficiency.
Strengthened team collaboration, communication, and task ownership through structured, project-based training.

projects.title: My Portfolio Website
points: Developed a modern and fully responsive portfolio website.
Integrated a JSON-based dynamic content system.
Deployed using GitHub Pages with a custom domain.

projects.title: Company Website
points: Built a professional and responsive company website.
Deployed on Google Apps Script with a custom domain.

projects.title: CI/CD Pipeline Automation
points: Automated build, test, and deployment pipelines.
Integrated SonarQube for code quality and security scanning.
Reduced deployment time and eliminated manual errors.

projects.title: AWS Infrastructure Deployment
points: Designed and deployed scalable and secure cloud infrastructure.
Configured VPC networking, subnets, routing, and IAM roles.
Implemented monitoring and alerting using CloudWatch.

education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering in Communications and Electronics Engineering
